程序包 prezoom.controller

类 StateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • prezoom.controller.StateManager
  • public class StateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class that controls all the state changes in PreZoom.
    作者:
    Zhijie Lan

    create date: 2020/11/4

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      private static int current_State
      the current selected state
      private static int total_State_Number
      the total number of states

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      StateManager()  

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static void clearAllStateData()
      delete all data
      static void deleteState​(int state)
      let all state-related class to delete a state, but the last one state cannot be deleted.
      static int getCurrent_State()
      get the current state number
      static int getTotal_State_Number()
      get the total number of states
      static void insertState()
      let all state-related class to insert a state at the next of the current state, then load the new state data
      static void reloadSavedData()
      after loading saved data from saving files, update all needed data
      static void setTotal_State_Number​(int total_State_Number)
      set the total state number to the given number
      static void switchState​(int state)
      Set the current state, and call updateStateData()
      private static void updateStateData()
      update the state data to the current state including camera CameraManager.updateCur_CamInfo(), objects GAttributeManager.updateCur_Attributes()

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • current_State

        private static int current_State
        the current selected state

      • total_State_Number

        private static int total_State_Number
        the total number of states

    • 构造器详细资料

      • StateManager

        public StateManager()

    • 方法详细资料

      • switchState

        public static void switchState​(int state)
        Set the current state, and call updateStateData()
        参数:
        state - the state index

      • updateStateData

        private static void updateStateData()
        update the state data to the current state including camera CameraManager.updateCur_CamInfo(), objects GAttributeManager.updateCur_Attributes()

      • insertState

        public static void insertState()
        let all state-related class to insert a state at the next of the current state, then load the new state data
        另请参阅:
        StatePanel.insertStateBtn(), CameraManager.insertCamState(), GAttributeManager.insertAttributeState(), GObjectManager.insertStateToGObjects(), updateStateData()

      • deleteState

        public static void deleteState​(int state)
        let all state-related class to delete a state, but the last one state cannot be deleted. If trying to delete the last state, all data will be cleared, and then a brand new state will be created then reload the state data
        参数:
        state - the state index to be deleted
        另请参阅:
        StatePanel.deleteStateBtn(int), CameraManager.deleteCamState(int), GObjectManager.deleteStateToGObjects(int), GAttributeManager.deleteAttributeState(int), updateStateData()

      • getCurrent_State

        public static int getCurrent_State()
        get the current state number
        返回:
        current state, 0-indexed

      • getTotal_State_Number

        public static int getTotal_State_Number()
        get the total number of states
        返回:
        the total number

      • setTotal_State_Number

        public static void setTotal_State_Number​(int total_State_Number)
        set the total state number to the given number
        参数:
        total_State_Number - the total number of states

      • clearAllStateData

        public static void clearAllStateData()
        delete all data

      • reloadSavedData

        public static void reloadSavedData()
        after loading saved data from saving files, update all needed data
